content:
❄️当冬日的寒意悄悄来临，总会不自觉地想起吉卜力世界里的温暖瞬间。

炉火边的相拥，雪夜里的等待，窗前的凝望……每一帧都像是一杯热可可，温暖了整个冬天☕️。

这些画面仿佛有种魔力，能将我们从忙碌的现实中暂时抽离，带回那个充满魔法与纯真的童年。希望这组壁纸能给你带来一丝暖意，愿你的冬天，有童话，有温暖，也有爱❤️。
image_prompts: (Studio Ghibli art style:1.5), masterpiece, highly detailed. Howl and Sophie sitting together on a cozy armchair by a crackling fireplace inside the moving castle. Calcifer the fire demon is cheerfully burning in the hearth. Warm, soft light fills the room, casting gentle shadows. Outside the window, a snowy landscape is visible. A moment of quiet affection and domestic bliss, cinematic lighting, atmospheric. --ar 3:4

(Studio Ghibli art style:1.5), masterpiece, highly detailed. Kiki, in her classic dress, and Jiji the black cat are sitting on a wide windowsill in a cozy attic room. They are looking out at a charming European town covered in a soft blanket of snow. Gentle snowflakes drift down past the window. The room is filled with warm, inviting light. A sense of wonder and peaceful contemplation, cinematic lighting, atmospheric. --ar 3:4

(Studio Ghibli art style:1.5), masterpiece, highly detailed. The iconic bus stop scene from My Neighbor Totoro, but in winter. Satsuki and a bundled-up Mei are standing under an umbrella as light snow falls. Totoro stands beside them, a single snowflake resting on his nose. The forest path is covered in snow, and the evening light is soft and blue. A magical and heartwarming moment, atmospheric. --ar 3:4

(Studio Ghibli art style:1.5), masterpiece, highly detailed. Chihiro and Haku in his human form are standing on the iconic red bridge leading to the bathhouse. It is dusk, and gentle snow is falling. The bathhouse's paper lanterns are lit, casting a warm, magical glow on the scene. Steam rises from the building. A serene, slightly melancholic and beautiful atmosphere, cinematic lighting. --ar 3:4

(Studio Ghibli art style:1.5), masterpiece, highly detailed. Princess Mononoke (San) is kneeling in a quiet, ancient forest covered in deep snow. She is gently stroking the head of one of the white wolf pups nestled beside her. The air is crisp and cold, with soft light filtering through the snow-laden trees. A powerful yet tender moment of connection with nature, atmospheric, cinematic lighting. --ar 3:4

(Studio Ghibli art style:1.5), masterpiece, highly detailed. Arrietty, the borrower, is standing on a wooden windowsill inside a human house. She is looking up in awe at a giant, perfectly formed snowflake that has landed on the glass pane. The world outside is a blurry, snowy garden. The scale difference is emphasized, creating a sense of wonder and delicate beauty. Soft, natural light, atmospheric. --ar 3:4
title: ❄️坠入吉卜力的冬日童话 | 愿你被温柔以待
